column2: SELECT TOP # p.objid AS CATID, p.ra AS RA, p.dec AS DEC, (sqrt (abs (power (p.petroR5#_r, #) /p.expAB_r - #*power (psffwhm_r, #) )) ) AS Re, -- convert circularised r_e to elliptical, for comparison with GAMA (Kelvin+#) . abs () to avoid floating point error for unresolved sources. s.z AS z, (# + #* (p.ModelMag_g - p.ModelMag_i) -- ModelMag uses consistent (r-band) aperture - #* (p.cModelMag_i - #* (log1# (s.z*#/#/#) + #) )) as Mstar, -- stellar mass from (g-i) colour and i mag (Taylor+#) p.cModelMag_u AS GAL_MAG_U, -- cModelMag is sum of deVaucouleurs + exponential profiles (https://www.sdss.org/dr1#/algorithms/magnitudes/) p.cModelMag_g AS GAL_MAG_G, p.cModelMag_r AS GAL_MAG_R, p.cModelMag_i AS GAL_MAG_I, p.petroMag_r + #*log1# (#*power (p.petroR5#_r, #) ) AS GAL_RE_R, -- surface brightness within #re (#-p.expAB_r) AS Ellipticity_r, p.fracDeV_r AS fracDeV_r -- in the absence of sersic index, fractional contribution of deVaucouleurs profile to cModelMag FROM PhotoObj AS p JOIN SpecObj AS s ON s.bestobjid = p.objid WHERE ( (p.type = #) -- galaxy -- AND (p.dec BETWEEN # AND #) -- Stripe # -- AND (p.ra BETWEEN # AND #) -- Stripe # AND (p.dec BETWEEN # AND #) -- GAMA # AND (p.ra BETWEEN # AND #) -- GAMA # AND (s.z > #) )
